title: President Obama to honor Stanley Cup champion Pittsburgh Penguins at the White House | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




September 04, 2009

 



President Obama to honor Stanley Cup champion Pittsburgh Penguins at the White House




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                   September 4, 2009 ADVISORY: PRESIDENT OBAMA TO HONOR   STANLEY CUP CHAMPION PITTSBURGH PENGUINS AT THE WHITE HOUSE   WASHINGTON — On Thursday, September 10, President Obama will welcome the Pittsburgh Penguins to the White House to honor them for their 2009 Stanley Cup championship victory. THURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 10, 6:00 PM Pre-set and final gather times will be announced next week Media Coverage: Media wishing to cover this event that do not have a White House Hard Pass must RSVP to media_affairs@who.eop.gov by 5 pm Wednesday, September 9th. The event is open press, but space is limited. Members of the Pittsburgh Penguins will hold a brief media availability in the West Wing stakeout area following the event.
